articles.author: Jordan Middler
articles.title: Austrian court says FIFA packs constitute gambling, orders PlayStation refunds - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: A court in Austria has ruled that FIFA Ultimate Team packs are a form of gambling and has ordered that affected players on PlayStation can receive a refund if requested.
articles.content:
A court in Austria has ruled that FIFA Ultimate Team packs are a form of gambling and has ordered PlayStation maker Sony to issue refunds.
According to Games Wirtschaft, a small court in the distric… [+2261 chars]

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 5 March 2023: Spectacular meeting of Venus and Jupiter - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is depicting two bright planets in the sky. These are none other than the rare Venus and Jupiter conjunction.
articles.content: The world is not yet done talking about the rare meeting of two planets in our solar system in the night sky! Almost on a daily basis, you can find new photos released on the internet of the Venus-Ju… [+1815 chars]

articles.title: Rishi Sunak vows to end asylum claims from small boat arrivals - BBC
articles.description: Anyone coming to the UK on a small boat will be removed to Rwanda or another country, under new laws.
articles.content:
Anyone arriving in the UK on a small boat will be prevented from claiming asylum, under new laws expected to be announced next week.
Ministers will have a duty to "detain and swiftly remove" anyone … [+3912 chars]
